Title: Mama Manchu Alludu Kanchu
Actors: Ali, Mohan Babu, Ramya Krishnan, Meena
Plot: Bhaktavatsalam Naidu (Mohan Babu), who has married two women and has successfully managed to keep the secret of the other woman to both the ladies..Later part reveal why Naidu married two of them and also his wives knowing the truth.
